text: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
author: Alber Einstein

text: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important
author: Bill Gates

text: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Bill Gates is a very rich man today... and do you want to know why? The answer is one word: versions.
author: Dave Barry

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

text: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what.
author: Spryte Loriano

text: Success… seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit
author: Conrad Hilton

text: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

text: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
author: Mark Twain

text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast
author: Alfred A. Montapert

text: I do not have superior intelligence or faultless looks. I do not captivate a room or run a mile under six minutes. I only succeeded because I was still working after everyone else went to sleep.
author: Greg Evans

text: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
author: Dalai Lama

text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going
author: Sam Levenson

text: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

text: There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.
author: Michael Phelps
